name: Kill Kill Bank Bank
description:
Kill Kill Bank Bank is a game made with unity for the Ludum Dare 44

The jam's theme was Your life is currency

In Kill Kill Bank Bank you play an hero that wants to be rich.
For that, he have entered on the goldgeon.
The rules are realy simple on the goldgeon.
Everything have a cost. If you don't have money, you die.

You can play with the keyboard and mouse or a controler.
ZQSD / Arrow keys / Left stick to move
Mouse / Right stick to aim
Left click / RB to shoot
Enter / A to buy on a shop
Escap / Start to pause

The game is not finished nor polished but still playable.
You win when you enter the boss room (there are no boss yet).

Thanks for playing :)

Code : Nicolas LAURENT
Sounds : Aurélien MONTERO
Graphs : Nico Nowak
